title: Breakin
description: This is a game I wrote to learn the Elm programming language. I enjoy programming functionally, particulary in functional languages.

title: Over-engineered Portfolio :)
description: What can I say? I love Elm, so I redid my portfolio using it.

title: Bidavilla
description: Owners list their vacation rentals online. Property features could be specified for rental (e.g. number of rooms, allows pets, etc.). Renters then could search properties based on keywords and/or specific features.

title: Dog Hunts
description: Craigs-list clone. Sellers list property. Challenging because different categories of items had different properties (e.g. car make).  Buyers could search listings and contact owners about them through the site to protect the user's privacy.

title: Forestry Application
description: Worked on mobile data collection app for the Forestry Service.

title: Delinquent Property Tax Inquiry Web Application
description: Created application that allowed users to look up delinquent tax records in Boyd County. Integrated PayPal to allow users to pay for lookups.

title: Evidence Locker
description: Developed and maintained Evidence Locker intranet application for the Boyd County Sheriff's Office to allow photos and video to be uploaded and managed.

title: United Way of Northeastern Kentucky
description: Redesigned and maintained site for the United Way. Created simple flash application to show donation goals on a thermometer.

title: E-commerce Sites
description: Configured and deployed multiple OS Commerce-based applications for clients. Created custom modules for payment gateways and shipping discounts.

title: Joomla CMS Sites
description: Designed, created, and deployed CMS sites for various clients using Joomla.

title: PHP Consulting
description: Diagnosed and corrected problems with various PHP web applications including some single page apps.

title: Online Voucher Processing System
description: Created web application for public defenders to enter information about cases they worked on such as expenses and services provided. This information is then uploaded to the state mainframe so that payment can be remitted to them.

title: Box Office Ticketing Application
description: Box office ticketing application that allowed events with multiple showings to be created. Events can either be general admission with a set number of tickets or assigned seating. For assigned seating shows, users can pick seats from the seating selection page which was created using jQuery and Javascript.

title: West Virginia State Police Sex Offender Registry
description: Responsive web application that allows people to search for registered sex offenders in the state of West Virginia. Admin portion for officers with more advanced search and reporting.

title: DHHR Program Plan Reporting System
description: Large-scale web application that allows local health departments to file their program plans with the DHHR. Admin application that allows review and approval of plans. Custom questionnaire engine that allowed forms to be created from the database with validation.  Custom wizard engine that allowed navigation forward and backward as well as by selecting individual tabs.

title: Grange Insurance
description: Large-scale web application that allows insurance agents to quote policies. Worked on the entire stack from the front end to the back end.
